name: Facebook: Dark and Flat
description:
DISCONTINUED. Facebook updates too often. I can't fix all the elements regularly because it gets boring eventually. I'll work on a new facebook theme to just override the chat and news feed size, since they're the primarily the reason why I still use this theme. After that this theme won't be continued any longer, so byebye updates. :D

Features:
◈ a dark and clean interface for Facebook
◈ replaces the pale blue Facebook color with a vivid shade of blue
◈ bigger chatbox for easier chatting
◈ complete with custom edited icons, logos, and animations
◈ full support of the Facebook Help Center and Facebook Like/Share widgets on external websites

Add-ons:
◈ auto-hiding sidebar: style 101531
◈ rounded corners: style 101594

Note: Install the font "Open Sans" for best viewing experience.

If you like the concept of this style, leave a comment below or check out my style 101407 style that fits this one perfectly!

Style last updated GMT+8, 3 December 2014, 05:41.

user.name: JeMhUnTeR
user.about: CC0 licenses on all my styles. Feel free to use all my work. No credit required, but would highly be appreciated if you do.

additional_info:
CHANGELOG

GMT+8, 3 December 2014, 05:41
Updating color of link texts because of review. Style is still discontinued though. I'll restyle Facebook again once they stop changing the class names and layouts too frequently.

GMT+8, 31 May 2014, 20:47
Fix broken logo. These facebook updates are ruining my style. >.< For now I just reverted it back to the default logo, so it wouldn't break in case facebook updates again.

GMT+8, 24 May 2014, 00:32
More pages timeline fixes.

GMT+8, 18 May 2014, 17:54
Fix on on the graph search bar. Partial support for pages timeline.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 22:23
Add shadow to name string on user timeline to make it readable. Fix some graph search border issues. Fix some background colors on photo viewer.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 05:33
Fix background color of reply panels on photo viewer lightbox.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 04:47
Fix a few on-hover color issues.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 01:59
Added support for Suggested Pages view.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 00:52
Brought back the large chatbox. It works as expected now.

GMT+8, 17 May 2014, 00:45
Updated style description. Added link to rounded corners add on.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 21:53
Change color of popup when uploading photo comments.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 20:21
Add border to sharing lightbox. Change some ui title color.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 18:23
Fixed the "Show All Results" popup on polls. Made ui popup backgrounds black instead of white.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 07:05
Centered and resized Similar Pages feed item. Some link color tweaks.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 06:30
Photo viewer background is now dark.

GMT+8, 16 May 2014, 01:01
Fix a link color that was changed by an update.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 22:20
Added new screenshot for external website like widget.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 22:20
Add support for Settings page.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 21:52
Add support for Activity Log.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 21:05
Add support for facebook pages outside facebook.com. This includes the like and share popups you would see on external websites. Fixed notification ticker color on other pages.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 20:48
Fix colors of notification popups.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 20:06
Removed native support for sidebar autohide. If you want it back, get it here: style 101531

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 20:06
Fixed broken messages colors.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 17:01
Change color of unread notification.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 15:47
Fix notifications menu colors, you can now identify the new notifications.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 10:26
Some small fixes plus a larger chatbox (when opened).

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 09:55
Make sidebar notif count have fixed width.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 09:52
Fixed notifications popup colors.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 09:10
Updated screenshots.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 08:55
Group page color fixes. Update loading gif to be smaller.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 07:54
Several timeline and ui fixes. Facebook Help Center is now also fully supported.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 04:12
More messages page fixes. Added bigger loader.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 04:12
Messages page fixes. You can now freely browse full conversation view with legible text.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 03:20
Sidebar color fixes. Trending post border fix. More message page fixes.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 03:20
Fix poll colors.

GMT+8, 15 May 2014, 03:04
Messages body now useable.

GMT+8, 14 May 2014, 03:28
Move general ui css up the code so it's easier to override.

GMT+8, 14 May 2014, 03:07
Added screenshot.

GMT+8, 14 May 2014, 02:56
Initial upload. This is alpha. If you're easily annoyed by weird illegible texts, you wouldn't appreciate this style. I'll be updating my code regularly - at least once a day. Check back for updates.

discussions.name: Really good, but has a problem when it comes to viewing Facebook Pages.
